'''Victorious Legend''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Tonkotsu Ramen]] with [[Gorou]]. The [[recipe]] for Tonkotsu Ramen is available from [[Shimura Kanbei]] in [[Inazuma City]] for 5,500 [[Mora]].

Victorious Legend restores 40% of a character's health and also restores an additional 2,350 HP.
